title: Chapter 1329 - 1329 The Void Attendant, Where'S My Medicine? 3
body:
Chapter 1329 - 1329 The Void Attendant, Where'S My Medicine? 3

1329 The Void Attendant, Where’s My Medicine? 3

The Void Attendant’s vision turned black, and his body swayed, as he almost fell in a fit of anger.

So, these treacherous humans had used the life of an ally to empty the Herb Garden of Divine Farmer that he had protected for tens of millions of years?

There wasn’t even a single stalk of Medicine in front of him. There was only the bed of the Void Attendant that had been widened thousands of times, and only the huge pit that was three thousand feet deep that stretched as far as the eye could see!

“Roar! Roar! Roar!”

The Void Attendant clenched his fists and roared at the sight of the deep pit in anger.

It was angry!

It was furious!

It was full of hate!

“Who was it?!”

The one who carried out such a crime should be hacked into pieces.

If he didn’t die, he should be thrown into the Inner island prison and imprisoned for the rest of his life!

However…

The Void Attendant didn’t even know who the person who emptied the Herb Garden was, what he looked like, or what kind of aura he had!

“Roar!”

The Void Attendant was furious.

It existed solely for the Herb Garden of Divine Farmer.

Now that the object of its protection was gone, how could it survive as a Void Attendant?

“Human!”

“Treacherous human!”

“Roar! Roar! Roar!”

The angry Void Attendant shot up into the endless sky with a bang after he braced his knees.

At this moment, it had a bird’s eye view of the Forest of Miracles.

No matter who the thief was, the Herb Garden of Divine Farmer had been emptied, so he must have been tinged with the aura of the Spiritual Medicine. As long as the Abyss Island did not open for a day, the thief would not be able to escape.

Since that was the case, he could find the real culprit by following the smell of the Spiritual Medicine!

But!

Before that!

As far as he could see, there were still so many humans who dared to wander around the Forest of Miracles.

“Because of the crimes your accomplices have committed.”

The Void Attendant roared, his eyes red with anger and announced, “All humans will be buried with him!”

The Forest of Miracles.

No, that included all the invaders and sinners in the Void.

Now, they were all going to die!

“Roar!”
